system.description: You can perfectly replicate another person's voice patterns, allowing you to deceive and manipulate through vocal mimicry.
system.benefit: The character can study the voice patterns of a Non-Xenos target for one hour that they can speak the same language as to learn how to mimic their voice. Listeners must make a -10 Scrutiny Test to tell the difference, or +0 Test if the character only mainly used Vox Recordings or Comm-Link Conversations to learn how to mimic the voice. Character's Deception automatically fails if the listeners can see them and identify they are not who they sound like. In a Social Conflict, if the character mimics their foe in order to ridicule or disparage them, the foe loses 1d10 rather than 1d5 Willpower if the character wins the opposed test.

specialAbilities.name: Voice Mimicry
specialAbilities.description: Study a voice for 1 hour to mimic it. Listeners need -10 Scrutiny to detect (or +0 if learned from recordings). In social conflict, mimicking opponent causes 1d10 Willpower loss instead of 1d5.
